ProjectTitle: Epigenetic regulation of HIV transcription: Towards a block-and- lock functional cure
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/06/2023
Will you generate metadata with your experiments? For sequencing MIxS or MINSEQE are often used, and for microscopy OME, for more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
You can also consider using a data repository for data preservation and sharing, for example RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, e.g. EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/), if needed you can keep the files restricted and give access upon request, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
